00064 #define MAX_UART_MESSAGE_LENGTH (MAX_NETWORK_MESSAGE_LENGTH +6)
00065 
00066 class LinkinterfaceUART : public Linkinterface, IOEventReceiver  {
00067 
00068     HAL_UART* uart;
00069     //unsigned char inputBuffer[MAX_UART_MESSAGE_LENGTH]; // bom, topicid, message eom
00070     unsigned char* inputBuffer;
00071     enum ReadStates {
00072         WAITING_FOR_START,
00073         READING,
00074         ESCAPE
00075     } readState;
00076     int readIndex;
00077 
00078     volatile bool maySend; // controlled by ^s, ^q from reader
00079 
00080     NetworkMessage* inMsg;
00081     char currCharFromLastCall;
00082     char prevChar;
00083     int inputIndex;
00084     bool foundUART_BOM;
00085 
00086     volatile bool transmitinProgrss;
00087 
00088     char getcharWaiting();
00089     void putcharEncoded(const bool mark, const char c);
00090     bool processByte(char input);
00091     inline void myPutChar(char c) {
00092         while(!uart->readyToSend()) {}
00093         uart->putcharNoWait(c);
00094     }
00095 
00096 public:
00097 
00098     LinkinterfaceUART(HAL_UART* uart, long int id = -1);
00099     void init();
00100 
00101     bool isNetworkMsgSent();
00102     bool sendNetworkMsg(NetworkMessage& outgoingMessage);
00103     bool getNetworkMsg(NetworkMessage &inMsg, int32_t &numberOfReceivedBytess);
00104 
00105     void sendFinished();
00106     void dataReady();
